name: Angularapp-seat-booking
tagline: This is a Angular app for booking seat can be used for movie hall, bus cab, car
body: ## Welcome to Angular js seat booking management system This Angular application is all about genrate dynamic seats and allow user to book them you can set limits per user sets no of seats in a row or column. this application is just in beta version i will upload full fleshed application very soon ###Technology used in this App * Bootstrap * Angular js * Html 5 * Jquery ##Author this angular js app was developed by Manoj Shukla @ 2014, For a company which helps eCommerce Business to full fill their golas.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
